Html:
Hi everybody!!

I'm new of this discussion so i'm sorry if i talk about an argoment explained in other threads.

I have configured a SAMP (Solaris 8 - Apache - Mysql - PHP) on my server and everything is ok.

Now i try to use phpexcel to read a xlsx file but the apache creates a core dumped.

I really don't know how i can fix the problem; if i call other pages where i don't use PHPEXCEL, everything works fine.

Can you help me PLEASE????

I compile php with this command line:

./configure --with-curl --with-apxs2=/usr/local/apache/bin/apxs --disable-debug --enable-ftp --enable-inline-optimization --enable-magic-quotes --enable-mbstring --enable-safe-mode --enable-wddx=shared --with-gd --with-gettext --with-mysql=/usr/local/mysql --with-mysqli --with-regex=system --with-zlib=/usr/local/zlib --enable-zip --with-libxml-dir=/usr/local/include/libxml2/libxml

This is my configuration:

Apache: 2.2.17

PHP: php-5.3.14 (I also tried this version but also gives the same problem)

PHPExcel 1.7.7

The page that crashes apache on Unix Solaris 8, it works very well on XAMPP on Windows.

Can anyone help me please?????

I do not know which way to head!!

HELP!!
